source_objects.description: From idea generation to creative confidence, the power of the subconcious to innovation and invention, come discover methods of creativity.
source_objects.title: Creativity

items.title: Understanding Online Fiction: What Makes a Hit Novel
items.headline: Learn from experts about the most popular serial online novels and how they draw thousands of readers worldwide.
objectives_summary: Online Fiction
Literary Analysis
Writing for Online Publishing

items.title: Creative Writing - Plot Scenarios Month 1

visible_instructors.job_title: Author, creative writing mentor, speaker and editor
visible_instructors.name: Morgen
visible_instructors.title: Morgen Bailey

items.headline: 31 scenarios (with exercises and tips) to create a portfolio of 31+ stories
objectives_summary: have a better understanding of the components of stories and how many variations can be taken for one idea.
collate their portfolio of 100+ stories with a view to polishing and submitting them.
identify various writing techniques and use them in their writing ongoing.

items.title: Drawing Sacred Geometry
items.headline: Discover what Sacred Geometry is and learn how to draw some of its most basic popular patterns.
objectives_summary: How to draw Sacred Geometry

items.title: Become a Writer in 31 Days: Writing Skills and Habits
items.headline: Develop skills and habits with 31 daily projects from a university writing workshop.
objectives_summary: Master the skills of more than 100 famous writers!
Develop 16 personal and social skills essential for success.
Practice advanced technical skills, such as point-of-view and "show, don't tell."

items.title: The Rebel Writing Life
items.headline: Build the Creative Life of Your Dreams
objectives_summary: How to navigate and thrive in the literary world.
How to build a community around you that will lead you to a successful writing career.
How to overcome fear of criticism and rejection that comes with putting your work out there.

items.title: Draw eyes, hands, legs, face in Indian Traditional Painting
items.headline: Creative ways to learn Indian Miniature Art
objectives_summary: Through this course you will understand the basics of Indian Traditional Art which is one of the oldest art and could be traced back to the times of Ajanta Ellora Caves.
Basics of Indian Traditional Art
Fine Line

items.title: Beginning Spray Paint Art
items.headline: Learn how to do create 10 spray paint art paintings that sell!
objectives_summary: Students will learn about the tools and techniques needed to paint 10 spray paint art paintings that will sell

objectives_summary: Painting technique with brush

items.headline: An Introductory Course
objectives_summary: Get insight into what you want and need to change yourself, your life and your world
Your soul's desires and aspirations, and how to move into those
How you can become who you want to be... who your soul wants to be

objectives_summary: How to structure novels or memoirs

items.title: Creative Writing - Plot Like A Pro - Write Your Novel

objectives_summary: You will create the plot of your novel or story and prepare the writing process.
You will be well prepared for writing your novel.
You will have learnt a lot of the basiscs that novelists need.
